English Content: The celebrated theory is still the source of great controversy.
Chinese Translation: 这一著名的理论至今仍是巨大争议的根源。

English Content: We can all meet at my office after the lecture.
Chinese Translation: 讲座结束后我们可以在我的办公室见面。

Chinese Translation: 所有论文必须附上提交表格。

English Content: All industries are a system of inputs, processes, outputs and feedback.
Chinese Translation: 所有行业都是一个输入、处理、输出和反馈的系统。

English Content: Our view is that educational reforms have been inadequately implemented.
Chinese Translation: 我们的看法是，教育改革执行得不够充分。

English Content: Americans have typically defined the process of plant growth in quantitative terms.
Chinese Translation: 美国人通常用定量术语来定义植物生长的过程。

English Content: Animals raised in captivity behave differently than their wild counterparts.
Chinese Translation: 圈养的动物和野生的动物行为不同。

English Content: Medical researchers have focused on causes of diseases and treatments.

English Content: Native speakers are exempt from the language tests in their own language.
Chinese Translation: 母语者不用参加自己语言的测试。

English Content: Nurses can specialize in clinical work or management.
Chinese Translation: 护士可以专攻临床工作或管理。

English Content: Organizational failure is considered from various perspectives in academic literature.
Chinese Translation: 在学术文献中，人们从不同的角度来思考组织层面的失败。

English Content: Peer group pressure has a significant effect on young people.
Chinese Translation: 同辈群体压力对年轻人有很大的影响。

English Content: Please note that the submission deadlines are only negotiable in exceptional circumstances.
Chinese Translation: 请注意，提交截止日期只有在特殊情况下才能协商。

Chinese Translation: 演讲者先给出了她今天讲座的大纲。

English Content: She has made a significant contribution to the field of chemistry.
Chinese Translation: 她在化学领域做出了重大贡献。

English Content: The rising inflation rate indicates a decrease in demand for consumer products.

Chinese Translation: 来访的演讲人曾是这个系的讲师。

English Content: There is clearly a need for further research in this field.
Chinese Translation: 这一领域显然有进一步研究的必要。

Chinese Translation: 一些机构的职业课程是由私营企业资助的。

Chinese Translation: 先进科技创造了经济增长。

English Content: Physics is the key subject to understanding the world and the universe.

Chinese Translation: 建筑师需要有解决问题的能力和设计的眼光。

Chinese Translation: 除了课堂要求之外，学生还必须通过所有资格考试。

Chinese Translation: 我们鼓励学生在截止日期前完成申请。

English Content: Social psychology is concerned with the understanding of human behaviors.

English Content: Tutorials are scheduled in the final week of the term.

Chinese Translation: 尽管有抗议，化学系还是被关闭了。

Chinese Translation: 尽管存在差异，但所有形式的生命都有某些共同的特征。

Chinese Translation: 我们将考察早期罗马共和国的学术实力。

Chinese Translation: 我们正在研究当今社会所面临的最重大的挑战。

English Content: Statistical results should be expressed in different ways depending on the circumstances.

Chinese Translation: 建议你们在这个项目中使用多种研究方法。

Chinese Translation: 这位考古学家的新发现在以前被忽视的基础上更引人注目。

English Content: New developments in technology are influencing current research.
Chinese Translation: 技术的新发展正在影响当前的研究。

English Content: Most known oil reserves will only last for half a century.

Chinese Translation: 教职工都很平易近人，友好，而且非常乐于助人。

English Content: The railway makes long-distance travel possible for everyone.
Chinese Translation: 铁路使每个人都能进行长途旅行。

English Content: The theme of the instrumental work exhibits more of a demure compositional style.
Chinese Translation: 这首乐器演奏的主题表现出了极为庄重的创作风格。

English Content: The ways in which people communicate are constantly changing.
Chinese Translation: 人们交流的方式在不断变化。

English Content: There is a clear need for further research in this field.
Chinese Translation: 在这个领域明显需要进一步研究。

English Content: This project is divided into four main sections.
Chinese Translation: 本项目分为四个主要部分。

English Content: Understanding how to use the library will save your time.

Chinese Translation: 那些正在考虑从事市场营销的人应该参加这次演讲。

Chinese Translation: 大学已投资于新技术，旨在支持学习。

English Content: Experts are now able to forecast weather over a much longer period.
Chinese Translation: 专家们现在能够预测更长期的天气。

Chinese Translation: 考古学家在古墓附近发现了工具和其他手工艺品。

Chinese Translation: 我们星期四上午有一节课。

Chinese Translation: 一位教授休了一年的假，专注于撰写她的书籍。

Chinese Translation: 明天的讲座将讨论美国的教育政策。

Chinese Translation: 生物学涉及对生命各个层次的研究。

English Content: Food has become a political issue in the world.

English Content: Implementation figures are expected to be improved in the next few years.

Chinese Translation: 你的统计信息取决于你的原始数据。

English Content: Certain organisms can reproduce using just one parent.
Chinese Translation: 某些生物体可以只用一个亲本进行繁殖。

Chinese Translation: 在实验室里必须一直穿着防护服。

English Content: Sound waves are unable to travel through vacuum.

English Content: Make sure you choose a course that provides great career opportunities.

Chinese Translation: 本科生有广泛的文化课可供选择。

Chinese Translation: 研究人员感到失望的是，研究结果已被证明是不确定的。

English Content: International exchange formed the important part of our study program.
Chinese Translation: 国际交流是我们学习计划的重要组成部分。

English Content: Consumer confidence tends to increase as the economy expands.
Chinese Translation: 随着经济繁荣，消费者信心往往会增强。

English Content: Food containing ample calories provides little or no nutritional value.
Chinese Translation: 含有过多热量的食物几乎没有提供营养价值。

Chinese Translation: 关闭电脑之前，请确保保存了所有文件。

Chinese Translation: 这本书最长可以借一周。

Chinese Translation: 这篇文章将论证技术带来的好处多于坏处。

English Content: The history department is very active in research.
Chinese Translation: 历史系在研究方面非常活跃。

English Content: Graphs and charts allowed data to be more easily understood.
Chinese Translation: 图表使数据更容易被理解。

English Content: The coffee machine located on the third floor is not working today.
Chinese Translation: 位于三楼的咖啡机今天不工作。

English Content: Muscle cells bring parts of the body closer together.
Chinese Translation: 肌肉细胞使身体的各部分更加靠近。

Chinese Translation: 你将学会如何理性地评估你的论据。

Chinese Translation: 课后可以下载幻灯片和讲义。

English Content: We can see the stars that were formed thirteen billion years ago.
Chinese Translation: 我们可以看到一百三十亿年前形成的恒星。

Chinese Translation: 作为学生会的成员，你可以影响并改变我们的大学。

English Content: The horizontal line on the graph indicates that there was no change in the period.
Chinese Translation: 图表上的水平线表示这一时期没有变化。

English Content: Purity is one feature that makes gold expensive.

English Content: Even simple techniques need to be practiced to become better.
Chinese Translation: 即使是简单的技巧也需要练习才能变得更好。

Chinese Translation: 学习历史可以帮助你更好地理解现在。

Chinese Translation: 编程计算机的能力每年都在极大地增强。

Chinese Translation: 每周吃两次鱼是健康饮食的建议。

English Content: Information technology has changed the way people study today.
Chinese Translation: 信息技术改变了人们今天学习的方式。

Chinese Translation: 图书馆本周将一直开放到午夜。

Chinese Translation: 心理学家说，我们的经历会影响我们的行为。

Chinese Translation: 实地考察是地理课程的重要组成部分。

English Content: Extracurricular activities can help students develop more talents.
Chinese Translation: 课外活动可以帮助学生发展更多的才能。

Chinese Translation: 商业管理有许多不同的风格。

Chinese Translation: 空气污染在全世界都是个严重的问题。

Chinese Translation: 城市规划强调效率和社区的扩展。

Chinese Translation: 这门课程将从建筑学的历史开始。

Chinese Translation: 请注意，研讨会现已取消。

Chinese Translation: 奖学金申请必须在这个月底之前交上来。

Chinese Translation: 营养物质在运动表现中起着关键作用。

English Content: Sugar is a solid carbohydrate which is always used to sweeten food.
Chinese Translation: 糖是一种固体碳水化合物，常被用来使食物变甜。

English Content: Our workshops are open to all students on campus.
Chinese Translation: 我们的工作坊对校园里的所有学生开放。

English Content: Reading histories involves a level of careful selection.
Chinese Translation: 阅读历史书需要一定程度的仔细选择。

English Content: Many universities provide exchange programs to other countries.
Chinese Translation: 许多大学提供到其他国家的交换项目。

English Content: The deadline for this assignment is next Wednesday.
Chinese Translation: 这个作业的截止日期是下周三。

English Content: City planners recognize the need for accessible public transport options.
Chinese Translation: 城市规划者认识到无障碍公共交通的必要性。

English Content: There are a variety of different ways to present statistical information.
Chinese Translation: 有各种不同的方式来表示统计信息。

English Content: The degree is taught by using a mixture of lectures and seminars.
Chinese Translation: 该学位是通过讲座和研讨课的结合来教授的。

English Content: The student magazine is looking for a new editor.
Chinese Translation: 学生杂志正在找一位新编辑。

English Content: Scholarships are available for both local and international students.
Chinese Translation: 本地及国际学生均可获得奖学金。

English Content: Libraries in many areas were closed due to the lack of funding.
Chinese Translation: 许多地区的图书馆由于缺乏资金而关闭。

English Content: Accommodation on campus is limited but there are more options nearby.
Chinese Translation: 校园住宿有限，但附近有更多选择。

English Content: All students have their own style of learning.
Chinese Translation: 所有的学生都有自己的学习风格。

English Content: This course can help to deepen your appreciation of art.
Chinese Translation: 这门课程有助增强你对艺术的鉴赏力。

English Content: The research shows that spending time outdoors has a range of benefits.
Chinese Translation: 研究表明花时间在户外有一系列的好处。

English Content: Career mobility is very important for new graduates.
Chinese Translation: 职业流动性（能在不同工作之间转换的能力）对应届毕业生来说非常重要。

English Content: The amount of time spent on configuration varies considerably.
Chinese Translation: 花费在配置上的时间差别很大。

English Content: Academic journals are usually edited by subject specialists.
Chinese Translation: 学术期刊通常由学科专家编辑。

English Content: Our company must have independent financial auditing.
Chinese Translation: 我们公司必须有独立的财务审计。

English Content: Please make sure your applications follow the guideline provided.
Chinese Translation: 请确保您的申请符合所提供的标准。

English Content: Understanding visual media has never been more challenging.
Chinese Translation: 了解视觉媒体这件事从来没有像现在这样具有挑战性。

English Content: An essay should use evidence from both primary and secondary sources.
Chinese Translation: 一篇文章会使用一手资源和二手资源的论据。

English Content: A surprisingly large number of students applied for that course.
Chinese Translation: 申请那门课程的学生人数多得惊人。

English Content: The university library holds a number of collections of geological maps.
Chinese Translation: 大学图书馆收藏了许多地质图。

English Content: Students are encouraged to read new books recommended by Professor Jones.
Chinese Translation: 鼓励学生阅读琼斯教授推荐的新书。

English Content: We hope students ignite and follow their interests.
Chinese Translation: 我们希望学生点燃并追随他们的兴趣。

English Content: Our company currently employs more than ten thousand people worldwide.
Chinese Translation: 我们公司目前在全球拥有员工超过一万人。

English Content: It is clear that the human population has an impact on the environment.
Chinese Translation: 很明显，人口对环境有影响。

English Content: It is an integrated course with several main elements.
Chinese Translation: 这是一门由几个主要元素组成的综合性课程。

English Content: The public is often misled by biased coverage.

English Content: The extent of advertising to children is very much open to debate.
Chinese Translation: 广告对儿童的影响程度是很容易引起争论的。

English Content: The renowned journalism will last for half of the century.
Chinese Translation: 那个著名的新闻报道将持续半个世纪。

English Content: The closing date of applications for travel scholarships is next Monday.
Chinese Translation: 旅游奖学金的申请截止日期是下星期一。

Chinese Translation: 大学的主图书馆将在下周六开放至午夜。

English Content: The study of utilizing projects is funded by the university.
Chinese Translation: 运用项目的研究由大学资助。

English Content: We help students to develop their individualities and follow their interests.
Chinese Translation: 我们帮助学生发展他们的个性，并遵循他们的兴趣。

English Content: Many universities are continuously expanding the postgraduate education online learning resources.
Chinese Translation: 许多高校都在不断扩大研究生教育的在线学习资源。

English Content: Our aim is to transmit mathematics teaching in the classroom.
Chinese Translation: 我们的目标是在课堂上进行数学教学。

English Content: Experts said reading and listening to music can reduce stress.
Chinese Translation: 专家说阅读和听音乐可以减轻压力。

English Content: The night sky has always involved mystery and wonder.
Chinese Translation: 夜空总是充满神秘和惊奇。

English Content: Please refer to the guidelines for more information on setting goals.
Chinese Translation: 有关设定目标的更多信息，请参阅指南。

English Content: The terms, illness and disease, are confusing despite clear differences.
Chinese Translation: 尽管“病”和“疾病”有明显的区别，但这两个术语仍然令人困惑。

English Content: Every living thing begins as a single cell.
Chinese Translation: 所有生物都是从单个细胞开始的。

English Content: These words recognized the excellence of the undergraduates’ research projects.
Chinese Translation: 这些话肯定了本科生研究项目的优秀。

English Content: Before preparing food, please make sure to wash your hands.
Chinese Translation: 在准备食物之前，请务必洗手。

English Content: Technology is no longer a simple tool that we can control.
Chinese Translation: 科技不再是我们可以控制的简单工具。

English Content: The teaching staff are actively engaged in original research.
Chinese Translation: 教职工积极从事原创性研究。

English Content: There is no economic reason why public borrowing is necessarily bad.
Chinese Translation: 没有经济原因可以解释为什么公共借贷一定是坏事。

English Content: For the purpose of research, data should be collected and analyzed.
Chinese Translation: 为了达到研究目的，应该收集数据和分析数据。

English Content: The deadline for the submission of this assignment is tomorrow.
Chinese Translation: 交作业的最后期限是明天。

English Content: We are phasing out disposable cups on campus.
Chinese Translation: 我们正在校园里逐步淘汰一次性杯子。

English Content: British students must study mathematics at secondary schools.
Chinese Translation: 英国学生在中学必须学习数学。

English Content: Companies’ projects must adapt to general data protection regulations.
Chinese Translation: 公司的项目必须适应常规的数据保护规定。

English Content: Our aim is to transform classical teaching in the classroom.
Chinese Translation: 我们的目标是改造传统的课堂教学。

English Content: He wrote poetry and plays as well as scientific papers.
Chinese Translation: 他不仅写科学论文，还写诗歌和戏剧。

English Content: You need to hand in an essay next semester.
Chinese Translation: 你需要在下个学期交一篇论文。

English Content: Scientific experiments should be repeated to verify the results.
Chinese Translation: 应该重复科学实验来验证结果。

English Content: We are more able to accommodate postgraduate students than previously possible.
Chinese Translation: 我们比以前更有能力安顿研究生。

English Content: Please click on the logo above to enter the site.
Chinese Translation: 请点击上面的网站徽标进入网站。

English Content: There are a wide variety of disciplines in the field of engineering.
Chinese Translation: 在工程领域有各种各样的学科。

English Content: These two regions are both areas of economic development.
Chinese Translation: 这两个地区都是经济发展的地区。

English Content: Parents are financially responsible for their children right up until they reach adulthood.
Chinese Translation: 父母对他们的孩子负有经济责任，直到他们成年。

English Content: More research is needed before any definitive conclusion can be drawn.
Chinese Translation: 在得出任何明确的结论之前，还需要进行更多的研究。

English Content: The untapped potential of using sunray is phenomenal.
Chinese Translation: 利用太阳光的潜力是惊人的。

English Content: Students are encouraged to think carefully about their accommodation needs.
Chinese Translation: 我们鼓励学生仔细考虑他们的住宿需求。

English Content: This is a compulsory course, so make sure you attend.
Chinese Translation: 这是必修课，所以你一定要参加。

English Content: Lecture outlines are available on the college internal website.
Chinese Translation: 课程大纲可在学院内部网站上查阅。

English Content: There is an agreed consensus that leadership skills can be taught.
Chinese Translation: 人们一致认为，领导技能是可以教授的。

English Content: Optional tutorials are offered in the final week of the term.
Chinese Translation: 选修辅导课在学期的最后一周提供。

English Content: Banks charge interest on the money they lend to customers.
Chinese Translation: 银行从借给客户的钱中收取利息。

English Content: Practical experience is a vital part of legal training.
Chinese Translation: 实践经验是法律培训的重要组成部分。

English Content: Effective presenters make eye contact with the audience.
Chinese Translation: 能带动观众的演讲者会与听众进行眼神交流。

English Content: Recession triggers exciting creativity and high rates of public wisdom.
Chinese Translation: 经济衰退激发了令人兴奋的创造力和高比例的公众智慧。

English Content: Students will focus on reporting news on changing the media world.
Chinese Translation: 学生将专注于报道改变媒体世界的新闻。

English Content: The use of wind energy has increased rapidly.
Chinese Translation: 风能的利用率已迅速增加。

English Content: Globalization has been an overwhelming urbanization phenomenon.
Chinese Translation: 全球化是一种势不可挡的城市化现象。

English Content: The other book isn't thorough, but it's more insightful.
Chinese Translation: 另一本书不够详尽，但更有见地。

English Content: Building trust is not something that can be achieved overnight.
Chinese Translation: 建立信任不是一朝一夕就能实现的。

English Content: The university will cease the colossal renovation of the faint empty theater.
Chinese Translation: 这所大学将停止对那座昏暗的空剧院的大规模整修。

English Content: A wide range of courses covered different aspects in this subject.
Chinese Translation: 许多课程涵盖了这门学科的不同方面。

English Content: Online courses enable people to improve their skills while employed.
Chinese Translation: 在线课程使人们能够在就业时提高他们的技能。

English Content: The university now faces a series of challenges of finance.
Chinese Translation: 这所大学现在面临着一系列财务方面的挑战。

English Content: The exam application system has been upgraded for professional exams.
Chinese Translation: 针对专业考试我们升级了考试申请系统。

English Content: New media have transcended traditional national boundaries.
Chinese Translation: 新媒体超越了传统的国界。

English Content: Please confirm that you have received the textbook.
Chinese Translation: 请确认课本已经收到。

English Content: The new lecture theater can accommodate a large number of students.
Chinese Translation: 新的讲堂能容纳很多学生。

English Content: All students can learn even though they have different speeds.
Chinese Translation: 所有的学生都可以学习，即使他们有不同的速度。

English Content: The marketing budget has been doubled since the beginning of the year.
Chinese Translation: 营销预算自年初以来已经翻了一番。

English Content: I will come back to this in a moment.
Chinese Translation: 我稍后会回到这个问题上。

English Content: The curriculum should be adjusted to the current development.
Chinese Translation: 课程设置应适应当前的发展。

English Content: The student shop sells a range of stationery.
Chinese Translation: 学生商店出售各种文具。

English Content: Let me give you an example to explain what I mean.
Chinese Translation: 让我举个例子来解释我的意思。

English Content: Tutors should set clear goals at the start of the class.
Chinese Translation: 导师应该在课程开始时设定明确的目标。

English Content: Courses on nutrition are growing in popularity every year.
Chinese Translation: 营养课程每年都越来越受欢迎。

English Content: Strangely, people are simultaneously impressed by and skeptical about statistics.
Chinese Translation: 奇怪的是，人们对统计数据既感到印象深刻又持怀疑态度。

English Content: The timetable for the next term will be available next week.
Chinese Translation: 下学期的课程表将于下周公布。

English Content: A demonstrated ability to write clear, correct, and concise English is obligatory.
Chinese Translation: 具备清晰、准确和简洁的英语写作能力是必需的。

English Content: Most of the lectures begin punctually, so do not be late.
Chinese Translation: 大多数的讲座都会准时开始，所以不要迟到。

English Content: The stock market crash had repercussions throughout the world.
Chinese Translation: 股市崩盘在全世界产生了影响。

English Content: The student union hosts a variety of social events.
Chinese Translation: 学生会举办各种各样的社交活动。

English Content: Default designed packages are likely to be used for most computers.
Chinese Translation: 大多数电脑都可能使用默认设计的包装。

English Content: Some people believe that education should be free to everyone.
Chinese Translation: 有些人认为教育应该对每个人免费。

English Content: Formal conclusions could be established through rigorous experiments.
Chinese Translation: 通过严格的实验可以得出正式的结论。

English Content: Our faculty includes five libraries across the university.
Chinese Translation: 我们学院在大学里有五间图书馆。

English Content: The reception staff can give advice on renting private accommodation.
Chinese Translation: 接待处的工作人员可以提供租用私人住所的建议。

English Content: The library will be closed for staff training tomorrow morning.
Chinese Translation: 图书馆将于明天上午闭馆进行员工培训。

English Content: Too much information may have been avoided by the group research design.
Chinese Translation: 小组研究设计可能避免了太多的信息。

English Content: Critical thinking is an essential component of a broad education.
Chinese Translation: 批判性思维是广泛教育的重要组成部分。

English Content: You are allowed to use multiple devices in the examination.
Chinese Translation: 你可以在考试中使用多种设备。

English Content: The English degree involves work placements in the third year.
Chinese Translation: 英语学位在第三年安排实习。

English Content: Technologies have enormously transformed the lifestyle of the majority.
Chinese Translation: 科技极大地改变了大多数人的生活方式。

English Content: A regional assembly was moved to the devolution of power.
Chinese Translation: 地方议会被转移到权力下放。

English Content: The deadline for the scientific assignment will be extended.
Chinese Translation: 科学作业的截止日期将会延长。

English Content: Scientists recognize different ice types according to the water molecule content.
Chinese Translation: 科学家们根据水分子的含量来识别不同类型的冰。

English Content: Having a strong motivation is important to achieve your goals.
Chinese Translation: 有一个强大的动力对实现你的目标很重要。

English Content: It is interesting to observe the development of the language skills of toddlers.
Chinese Translation: 观察幼儿语言技能的发展是很有趣的。

English Content: Most teaching staff make their lecture notes available online.
Chinese Translation: 大多数教师在网上提供他们的课堂笔记。

English Content: Children start producing words before they are able to walk.
Chinese Translation: 孩子们在会走路之前就开始说话了。

English Content: The skills of a great stage actor cannot be taught.
Chinese Translation: 伟大的舞台演员的技巧是教不来的。

English Content: The jobs tomorrow will require higher skill levels.
Chinese Translation: 未来的工作将需要更高的技能水平。

English Content: The goal of the government is to increase the investments.
Chinese Translation: 政府的目标是增加投资。

English Content: Social media is responsible for helping the government to solve social problems.
Chinese Translation: 社交媒体有责任帮助政府解决社会问题。

English Content: The university library has a collection of early geography maps.
Chinese Translation: 大学图书馆收藏了早期的地理地图。

English Content: Courses are assessed by group work and individual assignments.
Chinese Translation: 课程通过小组作业和个人作业进行评估。

English Content: Online courses allow students to work at their own pace.
Chinese Translation: 在线课程允许学生按照自己的节奏学习。

English Content: The academic department needs to be supported by the government.
Chinese Translation: 学术部门需要由政府提供支持。

English Content: Businesses must adapt to the general data protection regulations.
Chinese Translation: 企业必须适应通用数据保护法规。

English Content: When sentencing, the court will consider whether the criminal is guilty or not.
Chinese Translation: 在宣判时，法院将考虑罪犯是否有罪。

English Content: The internet has transformed the nature of publishing.
Chinese Translation: 互联网改变了出版业的本质。

English Content: More research is required in the field of food science.
Chinese Translation: 在食品科学领域需要进行更多的研究。

English Content: Many important policies need to be made.
Chinese Translation: 需要制定许多重要的政策。

English Content: The academic tradition of the school ensures excellence.
Chinese Translation: 学校的学术传统保证了卓越。

English Content: The scientists found most of the studies today.
Chinese Translation: 科学家们创立了目前大部分的研究。

English Content: For the small business, making profit is the main priority.
Chinese Translation: 对于小企业来说，盈利是首要任务。

English Content: Agriculture development is vital for poor rural areas.
Chinese Translation: 农业发展对贫困农村地区至关重要。

English Content: The new research has produced some unexpected results.
Chinese Translation: 这项新研究产生了一些意想不到的结果。
